title: Iconic Hard Rock Maldives with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Roundtrip Speedboat Transfers
description:
One of the world's best-known leisure brands takes the Maldives, offering outstanding accommodation, dining and entertainment just 15 minutes from Malé. Part of the incredible CROSSROADS Maldives complex, the resort offers countless dining and entertainment options, from the legendary Hard Rock Cafe® to the open-concept Sessions kitchen, the beachfront Mexican restaurant inspired by Frida Kahlo. With an additional 13 bars and eateries included in your daily meal plan, there's no going hungry here.

The signature Hard Rock experience is taken to new heights on this private island retreat - ideal for bustling families, the little ones can hone their fighting spirit with a full range of martial arts classes; play on air, land or water with aerial aerobics, dance classes and watersports, and parents can re-energise with Rock Om® yoga, dance to a stacked lineup of musical entertainment and take rejuvenating breaks at ROCK SPA. With thoughtful additions like complimentary use of personalised bicycles, kayaks and snorkels, every day is a new adventure in one of the world's most sought-after destinations.
offer_address: Akasdhoo, South Male Atoll, Male 20029, Maldives

title: Acclaimed Maldives Icon with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Speedboat Transfers
description:
Experience island living, world-class dining and premier entertainment with one of the most celebrated leisure brands - just a 20-minute speedboat ride from Malé in the glorious Maldives. As part of the CROSSROADS Maldives complex, this private island resort features countless dining options, from the iconic Hard Rock Cafe® to a beachfront Mexican restaurant inspired by Frida Kahlo.

With 14 dining spots and free-flow drinks, indulgence is always on the menu at this lavish hotel. Epic DJ nights, high-energy karaoke and live music keep the resort buzzing, while sun-soaked days call for lounging in the infinity pool with a drink in hand at the swim-up bar.

Families can dive into martial arts classes, aerial aerobics, dance and water sports, while parents unwind with Rock Om® yoga and tension-melting treatments at the ROCK SPA. With thoughtful additions like complimentary use of personalised bicycles, kayaks and snorkels, every day is a new adventure in one of the world’s most sought-after destinations.
offer_address: Akasdhoo, South Male Atoll, Male 20029, Maldives

title: Grand Opening: Hard Rock Maldives with Daily Dining and Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
It’s here: Hard Rock’s world-renowned dining and entertainment has reached the dreamy Maldives. Part of the incredible new CROSSROADS Maldives complex, just a 15-minute boat ride from Malé, the resort offers countless exciting dining and entertainment options, from the legendary Hard Rock Cafe® to signature Fender® guitars available in guest rooms.

Escape on the trip of a lifetime with return speedboat transfers from Malé, daily buffet breakfast, nightly three-course dinner across eight restaurants (or swap your three-course dinner for US$40 credit per adult towards an upgraded meal at signature restaurants, once per restaurant), one hour of free-flow signature cocktails every night and much more.

**Plus**: One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with dining inclusions and complimentary Roxity Kids Club® access.

Overwater and family upgrades available.
offer_address: Akasdhoo, South Male Atoll, Male 20029, Maldives

title: Hard Rock Maldives with Nightly Three-Course Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktails
description: Indulge in the most incredible barefoot Maldives luxury at Hard Rock Hotel Maldives, offering an all-access pass to daily dining, nightly cocktails and unforgettable sunsets in a magical location. Part of the incredible CROSSROADS Maldives complex, just a 15-minute boat ride from Malé, this #1 Tripadvisor-rated hotel offers world-class dining and exceptional entertainment options, from the legendary Hard Rock Cafe® to signature Fender® guitars available in guest rooms.
offer_address: Akasdhoo, South Male Atoll, Male 20029, Maldives

title: Maldives Island Haven with Seven Onsite Bars & Restaurants
description: Let your island daydreams come true with a stay in the palm-fringed Holiday Inn Resort Kandooma Maldives, an IHG Hotel - a true tropical haven. Discover the spectacular landscape, boasting both calm waters perfect for snorkelling and crisp surf breakers, jungle-covered paths and deep turquoise lagoons. Treat yourself at the Kandooma Spa by COMO Shambhala while the kids enjoy the Kids' Club, then choose between seven onsite bars and restaurants for a sumptuous meal.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Kandooma Maldives, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Kandooma Fushi,  South Male Atoll 8310, Maldives

title: Adults-Only Maldives Resort with Seven Onsite Restaurants and Wellness Spa
description: From the moment you're greeted on the powder-white shores of the adults-only Anantara Veli Maldives Resort, every outstanding detail is by design. Discover the art of healing at the wellness spa, where Ayurvedic therapies are tailored to your needs, and savour ocean-fresh fare at seven waterfront eateries. If you can pull yourself away, the resort offers once-in-a-lifetime excursions and endless opportunities for romance.
